ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(280, Self.Width - 60), Min(280, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Display recent search result items sorting according to table header buttons selected and searched on further based upon filter text input
With(
    {
        recentItems: If(
            IsBlank(txtVendorRecentlySearchedResultsFilter.Text),//No further filter search criteria has been entered
            Filter(
                'SAP Search Histories',
                'SAP Search Histories (Views)'.'My Recent SAP Search History',//Entity view that has filter logic to return user's search history records
                'Object Type' = 'Object Type (SAP Search Histories)'.Vendor//Filter on object type material
            ),
            Search(//Search history records further on entered filtered text
                Filter(
                    'SAP Search Histories',
                    'SAP Search Histories (Views)'.'My Recent SAP Search History',//Entity view that has filter logic to return user's search history records
                    'Object Type' = 'Object Type (SAP Search Histories)'.Vendor//Filter on object type material
                ),
                txtVendorRecentlySearchedResultsFilter.Text,
                "mpa_name",
                "mpa_objectid"
            )
        )
    },
    SortByColumns(
        recentItems,
        Switch(
            varRecentlySearchedSortByColumn,//determine which field to sort by based upon the tabel header column value selected and stored in variable
            btnVendorRecentlySearchedTableHeaderVendor.Text,
            "mpa_objectid",
            btnVendorRecentlySearchedTableHeaderVendorName.Text,
            "mpa_name",
            btnVendorRecentlySearchedTableHeaderLastSearched.Text,
            "mpa_lastsearchedon"
        ),
        varRecentlySearchedSortOrder//sort ascending or descending based upon value stored in variable
    )
)

!IsEmpty(
    Filter(
        'SAP Search Histories',
        'SAP Search Histories (Views)'.'My Recent SAP Search History',//Entity view that has filter logic to return user's search history records
        'Object Type' = 'Object Type (SAP Search Histories)'.Vendor//Filter on object type vendor
    )
)

If(
    VendorSearch.ResetSearch,
    Defaults('SAP List of Values')
)

Search(//Filter possible list of values according to mapped domain and language field
Sort(
    Filter(
        'SAP List of Values',
        Status = 'Status (SAP List of Values)'.Active,
        Domain = 'Domain (SAP List of Values)'.Country,
        Language = varISOUserLanguageCode
    ),
    'Display Value'
),cmbVendorSearchCountry.SearchText,"mpa_value","mpa_valuecode")

If(
    VendorSearch.ResetSearch,
    Defaults('SAP List of Values')
)

With(
    {_selectedCountry: cmbVendorSearchCountry.Selected.'SAP List of Value'},
    Sort(
        If(
            IsBlank(_selectedCountry),
//Filter possible list of values according to mapped domain and language field
            Filter(
                'SAP List of Values',
                Status = 'Status (SAP List of Values)'.Active,
                Domain = 'Domain (SAP List of Values)'.'State/Province',
                Language = varISOUserLanguageCode,
                !IsBlank('Parent Value')
            ),
            Filter(
                'SAP List of Values',
                'Parent Value'.'SAP List of Value' = _selectedCountry,//Filter based upon parent country selected value
                Status = 'Status (SAP List of Values)'.Active,
                Domain = 'Domain (SAP List of Values)'.'State/Province',
                Language = varISOUserLanguageCode,
                !IsBlank('Parent Value')
            )
        ),
        'Display Value'
    )
)

Search(With(
    {_selectedCountry: cmbVendorSearchCountry.Selected.'SAP List of Value'},
    Sort(
        If(
            IsBlank(_selectedCountry),
//Filter possible list of values according to mapped domain and language field
            Filter(
                'SAP List of Values',
                Status = 'Status (SAP List of Values)'.Active,
                Domain = 'Domain (SAP List of Values)'.'State/Province',
                Language = varISOUserLanguageCode,
                !IsBlank('Parent Value')
            ),
            Filter(
                'SAP List of Values',
                'Parent Value'.'SAP List of Value' = _selectedCountry,//Filter based upon parent country selected value
                Status = 'Status (SAP List of Values)'.Active,
                Domain = 'Domain (SAP List of Values)'.'State/Province',
                Language = varISOUserLanguageCode,
                !IsBlank('Parent Value')
            )
        ),
        'Display Value'
    )
),cmbVendorSearchState.SearchText,"mpa_value","mpa_valuecode")

If(
    Or(
        varIsProcessing,
        IsBlank(cmbVendorSearchCountry.Selected.'Value Code')
    ),
    DisplayMode.Disabled,
    DisplayMode.Edit
)

If(
    Or(
        IsEmpty(colVendorSearchResults),
        varIsProcessing
    ),
    DisplayMode.Disabled,
    DisplayMode.Edit
)

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(280, Self.Width - 60), Min(280, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript:
//Display vendor search result items for collection cached depending on if additional filtered text entered or not
With(
    {
        searchResults: If(
            IsBlank(txtVendorSearchResultsFilter.Text),//Just display results if not additional filter text entered
            First(colVendorSearchResults).List,
            Search(//Otherwise, search the results further based upon entered filtered text
                First(colVendorSearchResults).List,
                txtVendorSearchResultsFilter.Text,
                "City",
                "Country",
                "VendorName",
                "PostalCode",
                "Region",
                "Street",
                "Vendor"
            )
        )
    },
    SortByColumns(
        searchResults,
        Switch(
            varVendorSearchAllSortByColumn,//determine which field to sort by based upon the tabel header column value selected and stored in variable
            btnVendorSearchResultsTableVendor.Text,
            "Vendor",
            btnVendorSearchResultsTableHeaderName.Text,
            "VendorName",
            btnVendorSearchResultsTableHeaderStreet.Text,
            "Street",
            btnVendorSearchResultsTableHeaderCity.Text,
            "City",
            btnVendorSearchResultsTableHeaderState.Text,
            "Region",
            btnVendorSearchResultsTableHeaderCountry.Text,
            "Country",
            btnVendorSearchResultsTableHeaderPostalCode.Text,
            "PostalCode"
        ),
        varVendorSearchAllSortOrder//sort ascending or descending based upon value stored in variable
    )
)

Rule.InvariantScript:
conVendorSearchResultsTableHeader.Height + shpVendorSearchResultsDivider.Height + Max(
    galVendorSearchResults.LayoutMinHeight,
    conVendorSearchNoResults.LayoutMinHeight
) + Self.PaddingBottom + Self.PaddingTop

conVendorSearchAllFooter.Height + conVendorSearchResults.LayoutMinHeight + conVendorSearchFields.Height + conVendorSearchButtons.Height + Self.PaddingTop + Self.PaddingBottom + Self.LayoutGap * 2 + 10
